Description: Stamp (vessel): mikyala. Measure of lentils. Seven line Kufic inscription. Chipped at top. Made of green glass.
Curator's comments: From the same die: Balog, P. 1976. ‘Ummayad, ʿAbbasid and Ṭūlūnid glass weights and vessel-stamps’. New York, 269.
There is an extra 'tooth' to the 'sīn' of 'ʿadas' and the initial letter of the same word is mis-shapen.
Bibliographic references: Morton 1985 / A Catalogue of Early Islamic Glass Stamps (156)
Associated names: Named in inscription: 'Abd al-Malik b. Marwān
